```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
# Load necessary library
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
colnames(df_plot)
```


```{r}
# Pct.Women
prior_pct_women <-ggplot() +
                    stat_function(fun = dbeta, args = list( shape1 = 6/7, shape2 = 2), color = "blue", size = 1) +
                    labs(title = "Prior for beta_Pct.Women", x = "Value", y = "Density") +
                    theme_minimal()

print(prior_pct_women)
```



```{r}
# Pct.Bsc.25plus
prior_pct_bsc <-ggplot() +
                    stat_function(fun = dbeta, args = list( shape1 = 2, shape2 = 10), color = "blue", size = 1) +
                    labs(title = "Prior for beta_Pct.Bsc.25plus", x = "Value", y = "Density") +
                    theme_minimal()

print(prior_pct_bsc)
```



```{r}
# Median.Age
prior_med_age <-ggplot() +
                    stat_function(fun = dnorm, args = list(mean = -1, sd = 1), color = "blue", size = 1) +
                    xlim(c(-4,4)) +
                    labs(title = "Prior for beta_Median.Age", x = "Value", y = "Density") +
                    theme_minimal()

print(prior_med_age)
```

```{r}
# urbanindex
prior_urbanindex <-ggplot() +
                    stat_function(fun = dgamma, args = list(shape = 3, rate = 1), color = "blue", size = 1) +
                    xlim(c(0,10)) +
                    labs(title = "Prior for beta_urbanindex", x = "Value", y = "Density") +
                    theme_minimal()

print(prior_urbanindex)
```
